narration: This is the starting point. Two paths open before you.
choicesNarrations: Walk the path to the left.
Walk the path to the right

narration: You walked towards the left. The is a dense forest before you. It looks dangerous. Venture forth or fall back?
A filthy swamp is before you. What will you do?
Behold! A hungry wolf! You drew your weapon just before it could pounce on you...
choicesNarrations: The wolf ravaged your lifeless corpse, leaving nothing behind.
You washed the wolf's blood off of you hands and moved on.

questions.question: What is my name?
responses: No answer, no pass. Take this!
WOW! It is my name! How did you know?

narration: Behold! A serpent emerges out from the swamp. As it opened its jaws towards you, you drew your weapon...
choicesNarrations: The snake swallowd you whole. Your adventure ends here.
The snake is dead. You moved on.

questions.question: What is the partial differential equation of f(x,y)=x^3 y*2 + x^4 if we differentiate by x?
answers: What is a partial differential ... thing?
responses: That's what you get for not learning math!
(The serpent gasped could not handle your insult.)

questions.question: What is the airspeed velocity of an unladened swallow? If you say *I don't know* you explode!!! Haha!
answers: What do you mean? African or European Swallow?
responses: Umm... I don't know. (The snake explodes.)
